name: Shadow Strike
description:
**GAME STILL IN DEV*

Get ready for an epic adventure with our 2D platformer game, Shadow Strike! Take control of a skilled ninja who must navigate through challenging tile maps, defeat enemies, and collect coins along the way.

Each level presents new challenges and obstacles that will test your skills and reflexes. With beautiful pixel art and a catchy soundtrack, Shadow Strike immerses you in a thrilling world of action and adventure.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate ninja? Play Shadow Strike now and find out!
